entry.title: CI/CD Pipelines - Oh, the Places You'll Go!
entry.summary:
Description

Data scientists are creating incredibly useful data products at an accelerating rate. These products are consumed by others who expect them to be accurate reliable and timely, often promises unfulfilled. In this talk, we will explore how to use common CI/CD pipeline tools already within reach of attendees â€¦
entry.content:
Description

Data scientists are creating incredibly useful data products at an accelerating rate. These products are consumed by others who expect them to be accurate reliable and timely, often promises unfulfilled. In this talk, we will explore how to use common CI/CD pipeline tools already within reach of attendees to automatically test and deploy their apps, APIs, and reports.
